hadiths.text: Ibn Abbas narrated:"The Prophet went from Al-Madinah to Makkah, not fearing anyone except Allah the Lord of the worlds, and he prayed two Rak'ah

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي التَّقْصِيرِ فِي السَّفَرِ
chapter.eng-name: (What Has Been Related About) Shortening The Prayer During Travels
